techmeme.title: Netherlands-based dronemaker Destinus agrees to acquire Zurich-based Daedalean, which develops ML aviation autopilot software, for $223M in cash and stock (Yazhou Sun/Bloomberg)
India's IT giants face revenue erosion from challenges including corporations establishing their own global capability centers in the country and the rise of AI (Manish Singh/India Dispatch)
Uzbek fintech and e-commerce company Uzum raised $65.5M led by Tencent and VR Capital at a ~$1.5B valuation, up from $1.16B in March 2024 after a $114M Series A (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)

Users say AI notetaking tools for meetings can misinterpret context when generating summaries or share content meant for a select audience with all participants (Ann-Marie Alcántara/Wall Street Journal)
Shareholder letter: Reddit cites Profound's analysis showing it is the most cited domain across AI models, ahead of Wikipedia, YouTube, Forbes, and others (Alice Brooker/Press Gazette)
